text.autoconfig.anti-lootrun-tracker.opt: Regex of shard names to match for this mod to be active

How often to re-scan mobs near each chest (every n ticks, 1s = 20 ticks).
Values less than 2 scan every tick.
Lower values increase responsiveness of mobs entering/leaving the range of a chest
at the cost of very minor game performance.
Mobs around newly-rendered chests are immediately scanned regardless of this value.

Renders mob list in the action bar when
hovering over a chest

Furthest distance (in blocks) the player
can be from a chest to render mob list

Duration (in ticks, 1s = 20 ticks) to disable rendering the action bar mob list
after an external action bar message is received, so lootrun block messages
or other server messages do not get completely blocked out
while the mob list is being rendered.
Renders nearby mob count on chests
Changes the color of chests with no nearby mobs
Names of mobs that should be ignored
